name: Gindara Marinade Sauce, Garlic & Herb
description: Gindara Marinade sauces are a blend of authentic Sri Lankan flavours with a hot base of Nai Miris (Ghost Pepper) and infused with the freshest and the finest locally selected ingredients (Garlic & Herbs).It's a great way to intensify the flavour of any dish.*Images are illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
